name: High Tide (Brett)
description:
Take to the seas in your vessel!
Monsters are attacking!
The world is mostly underwater!
No time for questions!

Dive! Dive! Dive!

Content Warning: Middle school level swear words

PHONE/TABLET CONTROLS:
Controls displayed on screen

PC CONTROLS:
Up - Up Arrow / W 
Down - Down Arrow / S 
Left - Left Arrow / A 
Right - Right Arrow / D 
A (Interact/Shoot) - Alt / Z / J 
B (Cancel/Jump) - Ctrl / K / X 
Start - Enter

You can also download the ROM file to play either through a Game Boy emulator OR you can flash it onto a cartridge and play it on Game Boy hardware!

Made for the My First Game Jam Summer 2021 with GB Studio.

Credit to krümel (crumb)#0723 for "Supa-Hip Breakbeat" track.

All other art assets and music was created by me over the two weeks of the game jam.

Thank you for testing, Bryce Massé, Brett Barrow, Aaron Byrd, and Patty Templeton!
